Method Detail

isIpAddress

public static boolean isIpAddress(java.lang.String ipAddress)
Determine if the given string is a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address. This method uses pattern matching to see if the given string could be a valid IP address.

Parameters:
ipAddress - A string that is to be examined to verify whether or not it could be a valid IP address.
Returns:
true if the string is a value that is a valid IP address, false otherwise.

getLocalIpAddress

public static java.lang.String getLocalIpAddress(boolean removeIPv6)
Returns the IP address of the first configured interface of the device

Parameters:
removeIPv6 - If true, IPv6 addresses are ignored
Returns:
the IP address of the first configured interface or null
